title: An Act to protect youth from the harms of tobacco and e-cigarette products

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Lewis, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1567) of Jason M. Lewis for legislation to regulate access to certain tobacco products by persons under twenty-one years of age.  Public Health.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Health
Hearing scheduled for 07/14/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
